question: This Life Insurance partners Can fin homes to sell policies to home buyers.
option4: Canara HSBC Oriental Bank of Commerce Life Insurance
answer: Canara HSBC Oriental Bank of Commerce Life Insurance
explanation: Canara HSBC Oriental Bank of Commerce Life Insurance has partnered with Can Fin Homes for a 3 year corporate agency tie up to sell its policies to home buyers. Canara HSBC Oriental Bank of Commerce Insurance said that, all of its life insurance products will be made available to customers of Can Fin Homes. Canara HSBC OBC Life Insurance and Can Fin Homes aim to offer long term value creation for its customers. Can Fin Homes is the housing finance subsidiary of Canara Bank. It has more than 1.2 lakh customers.
